column1: A man tried to write with a broken pencil... but it was pointless
column3: The word pointless refers to lacking purpose or meaning.
column4: The discussion turned pointless when no one could agree.
column5: The pencil was left on the table, pointless without any lead.

column1: Whats the difference between a triangle and manchester united? A triangle has three points.
column3: Points refers to the tips or vertices of a triangle.
column4: The triangles three points are essential for its geometric properties.
column5: She made several points during her argument to clarify her stance.

column1: How do you throw a space party? You planet!
column3: The word planet refers to a celestial body orbiting a star.
column4: The planet is home to diverse forms of life.
column5: Mars is the fourth planet from the sun.

column1: What do you get when you cross an idiot with a watch? A cuckoo clock.
column3: Cuckoo refers to the bird known for its distinctive call, often associated with clocks.
column4: The cuckoo clock chimed every hour, marking the passage of time.
column5: The cuckoo sang melodiously from the tree branches.

column1: I took a class on procrastination there was always homework due next week
column3: Procrastination refers to the act of delaying or postponing tasks.
column4: His habit of procrastination often leads to increased stress when deadlines approach.
column5: The procrastination in her studies resulted in low grades.
